attributes.action: Stop intended Police Law to Stop/ Question anyone
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: If this law is implemented in the guise of anti-terrorism-the terrorists will have won a Victory by putting this country on the road to a Police State.If the Police decide they do not like the look of someone for ANY reason, or do not like that person's law abiding political, or non political law abiding activities, they will have the right to take away that person's freedom.This could lead to the removal of the liberty of any citizen for any reason-a Police State in other words.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
